attributes.action: Re-Nationalise Gas, Electricity and Water Companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To bring back under government control our gas and electricity suppliers. Stop selling them off to foreign investors. Utilise our own resources to our own requirements so that we do not have to buy back from foreign companies our own commodities. We should not be subsidising European communities by paying higher charges. Something must be done soon otherwise probably thousands of people will be unable to heat or eat. Also put a stop to extra Independent Gas Transporter charges.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
